document_data.title: Others
document_data.author: [[Paul Culotta]]
document_data.realm year: Mid-summer {{Yearlink|1369}}"Steelheart" references the recent destruction of [[Zhentil Keep]] (p. 55), which took place at the end of {{Yearlink|1368}} (''[[Ruins of Zhentil Keep]]'', p. 76). Since the adventure is said to take place mid-summer (p. 58), it is fairly clear the adventure is set in {{Yearlink|1369}}. The adventure contains a dating error, claiming Steelheart's parents fought in the [[Bloodstone Wars]] in {{Yearlink|1347}}, prior to her being hatched. At the same time, Steelheart is stated to be 27 years old. This would date the adventure to {{Yearlink|1374}}, which in turn would render a lot of the references to current events anachronistic, such as the repeated references to the [[Zhentarim]]'s allegiance to [[Cyric]]—the Cyricist faction was purged in {{Yearlink|1370}} (''[[Cloak & Dagger]]'', p. 16). This wiki chalks this discrepancy up to a mistake by the author.
